prodNameC: 美利迪恩腺病毒40/41型糞便檢驗法(未滅菌)
ingredientsDesc:
1.48 Microwells-Coated with Group Specific, Anti-Adenovirus Murine Monclonal Antibody.
2.Sample Diluent/Negative Control-Buffered saline.
3.Postive Control-Inactivated Adenovirus(AD41)in buffer.
4.Enzyme Conjugate-Horaeradish Peroxidase conjugated to anti-adenovirus types 40 and 41 murine monoclonal antibodies in a buffered protein solution.
5.Part A Substrate-Substrate buffer contains urea peroxide.
6.Part B Substrate-Substrate buffer contains tetranethylbenzidine.
7.Stop Solution-Contains 1N sulfuric acid.
applicantAddr: 台北市信義區松德路７４號８樓
efficacy: 應用酵素免疫法(Enzyme Immunoassay,EIA)定性偵測人類糞便中之腺病毒(Adenovirus)40/41型。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 3471 RIVER HILLS DRIVE, CINCINNATI, OH 45244, U.S.A.
